portals:
<portal name="<%= pkg.name %>" description="<%= pkg.description %>" code="<%= pkg.name %>" userType="<%= pkg.portalType %>" allowRegistration="<%= pkg.allowRegistration %>" allowAnonymousDataEntry="<%= pkg.allowAnonymousDataEntry %>" sendEncounterDueNotifications="True">
<page code="css" path="assets/<%= pkg.name %>-<%= pkg.version %>.css" pageType="css">
<%= css %>
<page code="js" path="assets/<%= pkg.name %>-<%= pkg.version %>.js" pageType="css">
<%= js %>
<%= html %>
